Faster, higher-quality localization tran: Более быстрый и качественный инструмент локализации перевода
You have received 1,000 Credits, enablin: Вы получили 1000 кредитов, что позволяет вам переводить на более чем 137 языков.
будет колебаться в зависимости от рыночных курсов.
To display currency switcher, please fol: Для отображения переключателя валют следуйте инструкциям ниже:
section, click Change currency formattin: нажмите Изменить формат валюты, затем измените с помощью кода ниже:
to go to Shopify theme editor >> enable: чтобы перейти в редактор тем Shopify >> включить Ciwi_Switcher >> нажать кнопку Сохранить в правом углу.
Create translation rules for certain wor: Создать правила перевода для определенных слов и фраз
Your store currently has no languages re: В вашем магазине нет языков, требующих перевода. Попробуйте добавить язык
The translation cannot be completed due: Перевод не может быть завершен из-за исчерпанных кредитов.
The translation task is in progress. Ple: Задача перевода выполняется. Пожалуйста, попробуйте перевести позже.
There are empty fields. Please complete: Есть пустые поля. Пожалуйста, заполните всю необходимую информацию.
You can add up to 5 translation rules: Вы можете добавить до 5 правил перевода
This language has been deleted. Please e: This language has been deleted. Please edit again.
Contact Support message: Sorry, your store is too large to continue translating. Please contact our team for support.
The request could not be understood by t: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.
Authentication is required and has faile: Authentication is required and has failed or has not been provided.
You don't have permission to access this: You don't have permission to access this resource.
The requested resource could not be foun: The requested resource could not be found.
The server encountered an unexpected con: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
The server received an invalid response: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.
The server did not receive a timely resp: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.
Automatically switch to the target langu: Automatically switch to the target language and currency.
rating.title: We need your support.
rating.description: If you are satisfied with our products and services, please give us your evaluation to help us improve better!
progressing.title: Translation tasks:
progressing.finished: The translation has been completed. The translated content needs to be published before it takes effect.
progressing.contact: Free translation credits are insufficient. Please purchase credits and retry the translation.
progressing.somethingWentWrong: Some unexpected errors occurred. Please click the button to contact support for resolution.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or need assistance, please click the button below to contact support.
userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.feature1: How to translate your Shopify store?
userGuide.feature2: How to enable the App from Shopify theme customization to apply the language & currency exchange switcher
userGuide.feature3: How to set up multi-currency pricing on your Shopify store?
dashboard.description1: We support more than 100 languages and use professional large language models such as Open AI and DeepSeek for translation
dashboard.description2: We support more than 100 currencies, and can switch currencies at any time according to IP to increase order conversion rate
dashboard.title3: We are constantly developing new features
dashboard.description3: We are fully committed to helping our customers succeed. Please feel free to contact us if you need any help.
transLanguageCard1.title: Translate your store
transLanguageCard1.description: Click Translate. In the next step, you can set the translation conditions and implement professional local translation based on powerful AI.
transLanguageCard2.title: Manage store languages
transLanguageCard2.description: Add, delete and publish languages, support manual management of translations
transLanguageCard3.title: Use translation experts for translation
transLanguageCard3.description: We have more than 100 translation experts around the world who can translate manually
transCurrencyCard1.title: Setting up multiple currencies
transCurrencyCard1.description: Depending on the market you set, we will automatically match currencies and allow for exchange rate adjustments
transCurrencyCard2.title: How to set currency code?
transCurrencyCard2.description: Setting a currency code allows you to switch currencies
transCurrencyCard3.title: How do I set up a currency language switcher?
transCurrencyCard3.description: Setting up a switcher allows you to better achieve dynamic switching and improve visitor conversion rates
planCard.title: Develop for customer success
planCard.description: If there is no feature you want, please feel free to submit and vote, we will iterate a new feature every week!

planCardTableList2.title: Vote

devplanCard1.title: Поддерживает частный API OpenAI, позволяя использовать собственные API-кредиты для перевода
devplanCard2.title: добавляет прогресс перевода
devplanCard3.title: оптимизирует стиль переключателя, поддерживает отображение в футере
devplanCard4.title: улучшает скорость перевода, добавляя режим быстрого перевода
Your translation task exceeds the free l: Ваша задача перевода превышает бесплатный лимит, необходимо приобрести дополнительные кредиты
Welcome to our app! If you have any ques: Добро пожаловать в наше приложение! Если у вас есть вопросы, пишите нам на support@ciwi.ai, и мы ответим как можно скорее.
Some content of the store does not compl: Некоторый контент магазина не соответствует политике перевода OpenAI, пожалуйста, свяжитесь с нами для ручной поддержки.
